item.title: Pedro Pascal Downplays Reed Richards Becoming the New Leader of the Avengers in ‘Doomsday’: ‘That’s a Little Bit of a Mislead’
item.description: Pedro Pascal is the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic, but he is not the new leader of the Avengers. At least that’s what the actor says… for now. An intervi
